assignments

Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignments.CourseManager

  • public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utility functions to help deal with Courses.
    Author:
    Alex Brandt

    • Field Detail

      • FALL_END_DATE

        public static final java.util.Calendar FALL_END_DATE
        The end date of the fall semester. December 31.

      • WINTER_END_DATE

        public static final java.util.Calendar WINTER_END_DATE
        The end date of the winter semester. April 31.

      • SPRING_END_DATE

        public static final java.util.Calendar SPRING_END_DATE
        The end date of the spring semester. August 31.

    • Method Detail

      • courseIsActive

        public static boolean courseIsActive(Course course)
        Determine if a course is active based on the course's semester and the current date.
        Parameters:
        course - the Course to determine if it is active
        Returns:
        true iff the course is offered in the current semester.

      • getCoursesForUser

        public static EnrollmentListReturn getCoursesForUser(User user)
        Get the enrollments for a given User and that User's active role. This includes student, marker, instructor.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to get enrollments for.
        Returns:
        an EnrollmentListReturn encapsulating all necessary data
        See Also:
        EnrollmentListReturn

      • isUserAuthorizedWithRole

        public static boolean isUserAuthorizedWithRole(User user,
                                               java.lang.String courseID,
                                               java.lang.String courseTerm,
                                               java.lang.String role)
        Determine if a User is authorized to view a course with the given role.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to authorize
        courseID - the course ID of the Course instance to compare
        courseTerm - the term of the Course instance to compare
        role - the attempted role the User wishes to be authorized as
        Returns:
        true iff the user is authorized.

      • getCourse

        public static Course getCourse(java.lang.String courseID,
                               java.lang.String term)
        Get a course given the courseID and term
        Parameters:
        courseID - the courseID of the course
        term - the term of the course offering
        Returns:
        the Course object described by courseID and term, or null if not found.

      • addAssignmentToCourse

        public static void addAssignmentToCourse(java.lang.String courseID,
                                         java.lang.String term,
                                         int submissionLimit)
        Add an assignment to a Course specified by courseID, term. The new assignment should have a submisison limit as specified.
        Parameters:
        courseID - the courseID of the course
        term - the term of the course offeirng
        submissionLimit - the limit on submission attemps to towards this assignment.
